messages.zh: 各种各样的人和事汇聚在村子里的酒吧，
messages.en: All kinds of people and information gathered in the village bar.

messages.zh: 他们各怀鬼胎，权衡利弊，
messages.en: Each person with their own goals to pursuit, after weighing the pros and cons.

messages.zh: 最后在杯酒间作出决定，
messages.en: In the end, between alcohol drinks they form teams to hunt.

messages.zh: 成群结队的出发，刚到门口就大打出手，
messages.en: With a team formed, they may even fight with one another before walking out of the bar.

messages.zh: 这就是赏金猎人。
messages.en: That is what it means to be a bounty hunter.

messages.zh: 拦住她！
messages.en: Stop her!

messages.zh: 拦什么啊！你没看到他们全部被干掉了吗！
messages.en: What do you mean stop her?! Don't you see how they all got killed?!

messages.zh: 你上啊，你平常不是很厉害吗！
messages.en: Face her then! You always boast how strong you are!

messages.zh: 我，我不行！这家伙可是那个灾星啊！
messages.en: I-I can't! This person is a walking disaster!

messages.zh: （阿戈尔语）拦住我的都会死。
messages.en: (Aegir language) Death to those who stop me.

messages.zh: （阿戈尔语）向我挥出武器的都粉身碎骨。
messages.en: (Aegir language) Those who brandished their weapons at me shall be crushed into pieces.

messages.zh: （阿戈尔语）想死的，向前踏出一步。
messages.en: (Aegir language) If you seek death, take a step forward.

messages.zh: 你究竟在说些什么？
messages.en: What on earth are you talking about?

messages.zh: 唉？上尉？上尉怎么消失了？
messages.en: Eh? Captain? How did he disappear?

messages.zh: 上尉掉进河里了......！
messages.en: H-he fell into the river..!

messages.zh: 这、这家伙一击就......
messages.en: This person… w-with only one blow...

messages.zh: 啊，忘了他们听不懂......算了。
messages.en: Ah, I forgot they don't understand... Nevermind.

messages.zh: 说，她在哪？
messages.en: Speak, where is she?

messages.zh: 她？你指谁？别问我，我什么不知道啊！
messages.en: She? Who? Don't ask me, I don’t know anything!

messages.zh: 呃啊！！！
messages.en: Argh!

messages.zh: 给、给我记住！
messages.en: W-we shall remember this!

messages.zh: 喂！你们别急着撤退！先把上尉捞起来！
messages.en: Hey! All of you stop retreating! We still need to get the captain out of the water!

messages.zh: 那、那个人是——
messages.en: T-that person is!

messages.zh: 你认识她？
messages.en: Do… you know her?

messages.zh: 她可能是我的同事......
messages.en: She could be a colleague of mine...

messages.zh: 不过，接到这项委托的应该是我啊？我可是好不容易才从陨星姐手里抢到这项任务的......
messages.en: But I should be the only one who accepted this request? I had a hard time getting this job from Meteorite.

messages.zh: 唔唔唔......也许她是为别的任务来的？
messages.en: W-well.... maybe she's here on a different mission?

messages.zh: 唔，赏金猎人好像溃退了？
messages.en: Hey… The bounty hunters seem to be retreating?

messages.zh: 事不宜迟，我们趁现在溜出村子吧。
messages.en: Without further ado, let's slip out of the village now.

messages.zh: 既然还有其他干员在这个村子里，说不定事情会好办一些。
messages.en: Perhaps things will be easier now that there are other operator in the village.

messages.zh: 可萝尔，楼梯很黑，你要扶紧我。
messages.en: Carol, the stairs are very dark. Please support me.

messages.zh: 那个，你要和她联络一下吗？
messages.en: Do you want to get in touch with her?

messages.zh: 嗯，如果可能的话，我想——
messages.en: Yes, if possible, I'd like to --
Urgh!
W-what!

messages.zh: 我、我的鼻子！这个门怎么自己弹开——
messages.en: My, my nose! How did this door opened by itself --

messages.zh: 欸？这里怎么会蹲着人——
messages.en: Huh… Why there are people squatting here.

messages.zh: 格拉尼！发生了什——
messages.en: Grani! What happen--

messages.zh: 你们全都给我闭嘴！嘘！
messages.en: Shh! All of you shut up!

messages.zh: 唉，你们这些干农活的肯定什么都不懂。没看到那个灾星吗！
messages.en: You farm workers don't know anything. Didn't you see that walking disaster!

messages.zh: 无论是哪个赏金猎人，都不会想和她碰面的！敢在她面前昂首挺胸的，多半是没见过她毁掉整座城市的样子吧！
messages.en: No bounty hunter wants to encounter her! Those daring enough to hold their heads high in front of her probably haven’t seen her destroy a whole city!

messages.zh: 这么夸张吗！那不是靠她一个人就可以把————
messages.en: Is that an exaggeration? Does that mean she alone can--

messages.zh: 声音轻点，别被她发现！
messages.en: Keep your voices down. Don't let her see you!

messages.zh: 唔，可是我还要找她——
messages.en: Well, b-but I still have to find her and...

messages.zh: 说了小声点！
messages.en: I said keep your voice down!
O-okay...

messages.zh: 感觉比罗德岛里流传的版本更离谱......
messages.en: It feels even more outrageous than the version circulating in Rhode Island.

messages.zh: 那、那个怪物走了吗？
messages.en: Is t-the monster gone?
I think she left...!

messages.zh: 总算走了，啊哟，吓死我了。
messages.en: Finally, she scared the living crap out of me.

messages.zh: 是，是啊。
messages.en: Y-yeah.

messages.zh: 原以为这点活我们一队就能搞定，怎么会碰上这种麻烦事。那种家伙都来了的话，得做好准备才能——
messages.en: We thought we could handle this job with only one team. How could we get into such trouble? If even that walking disaster showed up, we need to be more prepared --

messages.zh: ——等等！
messages.en: Wait a minute!

messages.zh: 啊。
messages.en: Ah.

messages.zh: 哈！拿枪的小子！居然在这里碰见你！
messages.en: Haha, guy with the lance, I can't believe I ran into you here.

messages.zh: 还有村长！你真是送上门来了！
messages.en: And the village chief right in my doorstep!

messages.zh: 格拉尼，你难道是故意......
messages.en: Grani, did you intend for this to happen?

messages.zh: 不，只是他们态度那么好，我也没回过神来啊！
messages.en: No, it's just that their attitude was so good that I didn't come to my senses sooner!

messages.zh: 废话少说，把村长交给我们！不然我手里这把刀保证就让你吃足苦头！
messages.en: Stop talking nonsense and hand over the village chief! Or this sword in my hand will make you suffer!

messages.zh: 就用那把断刀？
messages.en: That broken sword?

messages.zh: ......这，这小子什么时候出的枪？！
messages.en: ...W-when did this guy used his lance?!

messages.zh: 用暗号召集附近还在的人！
messages.en: Call everyone who is still around with the code!

messages.zh: 还有，去把之前用来毁掉农田的虫子都赶出来，让她们尝尝厉害！
messages.en: Also, bring me all the bugs that were used to destroy the fields, let them have a taste it!
